lyric.lyric1: Love or lust, regardless we'll fuck cause the trife in us

lyric.lyric2: Look inside of your soul and you can find out it never exist

lyric.lyric2: I can feel the new people around me just want to be famous
lyric.lyric3: You can see that my city found me then put me on stages

lyric.lyric1: I'm trying to keep it alive and not compromise the feeling we love
lyric.lyric2: You're trying to keep it deprived and only co-sign what radio does

lyric.lyric2: Respect my mind or die from lead shower

lyric.lyric1: Goddamn I feel amazing, damn I'm in the matrix

lyric.lyric3: Start up that Maserati and VROOM VROOM I'm racing

lyric.lyric2: I hope the universe love you today

lyric.lyric1: Bumping Jeezy first album looking distracted
lyric.lyric2: Speaking language only we know, you think is an accent

lyric.lyric2: Air conditioner broke and I hear my stomach screaming
lyric.lyric3: Hungry for anything unhealthy and if nutrition can help me
lyric.lyric4: I’ll tell you to suck my dick then I'll continue eating

lyric.lyric3: I really doubt it

lyric.lyric1: When I see that thing move

lyric.lyric2: Making sure my punctuation curve, every letter here's true

lyric.lyric2: And they wonder why I rarely smoke now
